    • checkPersonalTarget

      public int checkPersonalTarget(Shelf shelf, CardPersonalTarget cardPersonalTarget)
      method that compares the player's shelf and the personalCard, and returns the number of the completed objectives (0,...,6) the if statement is true if the shelf's TileSlot is NOT EMPTY and true if the tile in the TileSlot is the same color as the Personal Card (in position i)
      Parameters:
      shelf - Shelf of the player
      cardPersonalTarget - his personal target card
      Returns:
      completedGoals

      Returns:

    • checkDiagonal

      public boolean checkDiagonal(TileSlot[][] shelfMatrix, Coordinates coordinates)
      method that checks, for all four possible diagonals, if the tiles are the same colour
      Parameters:
      shelfMatrix - player's shelf
      coordinates - coordinates of the first tile of the diagonal
      Returns:
      true if all tiles are different
